Klasse AccountStorage

java.lang.Object
server.AccountStorage
public class AccountStorage extends Object
A utility class for storing and retrieving a list of Account objects to and from a JSON file located in the user's operating system-specific application data directory.

  • Feldübersicht

    Felder
    Modifizierer und Typ
    Feld
    Beschreibung
    static final Path
    DATA_PATH
    The path to the JSON file used to store account data, resolved based on the user's OS.

  • Methodendetails

    • saveAccounts

      public static void saveAccounts(List<Account> accounts) throws IOException
      Saves a list of Account objects to the JSON file.
      Parameter:
      accounts - the list of accounts to save
      Löst aus:
      IOException - if an I/O error occurs while writing the file.

    • loadAccounts

      public static List<Account> loadAccounts() throws IOException
      Loads a list of objects from the Jsonfile
      Gibt zurück:
      the list of loaded accounts.
      Löst aus:
      IOException - if an I/O erroe occurs while reading the file.
